description:
A standout townhouse in the heart of West Leedy!
Live the dream in this striking, warehouse inspired, super chic townhouse. Relax and enjoy your fabulously low maintenance home that’s designed to maximise space and natural light. With lovely sundrenched living, dining and well-appointed kitchen opening to the gorgeous private courtyard with space to entertain, and blissful loft master bedroom with sitting room / study and modern bathroom, the living is easy! Ideally placed to indulge in everything West Leederville and its Subiaco, Leederville and North Perth neighbours have to offer, 3/150 Cambridge St is a gloriously relaxed, stylish, supremely easy to live in low maintenance home with the perfect blend of sophistication convenience, lifestyle and location! A brilliant entrance, downsizer or astute investment into vibrant West Leederville!

THE HOME
1 bedroom
1 bathroom
Kitchen
Living / dining
European style laundry
1 wc

FEATURES
Modern, industrial style New York loft inspired townhouse
Immaculately presented with a sleek, urban vibe
Beautiful bamboo floors across ground level
Spectacular light filled interiors with a neutral palette throughout
Showcasing magnificent double storey industrial steel frame windows with natural light pouring in
The gorgeous open plan living, dining and kitchen
Open plan living with glass door access to a private courtyard, split system reverse cycle air conditioning
Stylish timber kitchen with counter seating, underbench oven, gas cooktop, tile splashback, dishwasher
Concealed European style laundry with space for undercounter washer, laundry trough and storage cabinet
Understairs storage
Honed concrete staircase with powder coated balustrading
Charcoal carpet to upper floor
Second living room / retreat / office with arch window
Gorgeous sunny master bedroom with floor to ceiling steel frame windows, mirrored built in robes, black out roller blinds, ceiling fan, split system reverse cycle air conditioning
Modern bathroom with shower, vanity, wc

OUTSIDE FEATURES
Spacious, private entertaining courtyard with high rendered walls, planter boxes, built in seating, fairy lights
Large storeroom

PARKING
Secure auto garage for 1 car

LOCATION
Absolutely unbeatable! A super central, super convenient West Leederville locale only moments from all the action! Situated well back from Cambridge Street, yet with everything on your doorstep. It’s just a 60 second walk around the corner to Butter’s Place for morning coffee, and a couple of minutes more to renowned local fave, Piccolo’s Corner! And beyond… well, it’s a short walk to the West Leederville Shopping Centre where there’s Coles, BWS, post office, pharmacy and more. Pearth Organic Kitchen, Mary Street Bakery, Besk, JB O’Reilly’s offer a whole host of options and only slightly further afield is a vast range of dining, entertainment, shopping and socializing possibilities in both Subiaco and Leederville. You can easily and safely cycle to the CBD, it’s 600m to West Leederville Train Station and the closest bus stop is practically outside your door! It’s the perfect spot! Walk score 83.
33m to nearest bus Stop
78m to Butter’s Place
230m to SJOGS
290m to Piccolo’s Corner
450m to Coles
500m to Mary Street Bakery
550m to Pearth Organic Kitchen
550m to Besk
600m to West Leederville Station
600m to JB O’Reilly’s
700m to Mueller Park
3.2km to Perth CBD

SCHOOL CATCHMENTS
West Leederville Primary School
Bob Hawke College (year 7 intake started 2020)
Optional Intake Area Mount Lawley Senior High School, or Churchlands Senior High School (until Bob Hawke intake begins)


WHAT THE OWNER SAYS
“We love the location, walking distance to so many bars, cafes, transport options, hospital, Subi, Leederville and the City. Quiet laneway access is also a massive bonus. The uniqueness of the property - large open area downstairs opening onto the courtyard is a great place to hang out in the evenings or grab some morning sun through the wall of windows and the low maintenance / lock up and leave nothing to worry about if going away for a holiday.”

TITLE DETAILS
Lot 3 on Strata Plan 43166
Volume 2536 Folio 893

STRATA AREA
Internal Area 81 sq. metres
Total Strata Area 139 sq. metres

ESTIMATED RENTAL RETURN
From $500 per week

OUTGOINGS
Town of Cambridge: $1,502.95 / annum 22/23
Water Corporation: $1,375.21 / annum 22/23
Strata Levy: $303.00 / quarter
Reserve Levy: $33.00 / quarter
Total Strata Levies: $336.00 / quarter

Disclaimer: Whilst every care has been taken in the preparation of the marketing for this property, accuracy cannot be guaranteed. Prospective buyers should make their own enquiries to satisfy themselves on all pertinent matters. Details herein do not constitute any representation by the Seller or the Seller’s Agent and are expressly excluded from any contract.
